Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class TurnInfo

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.TurnInfo
public class TurnInfo
extends java.lang.Object
this class if were all the current turn temporary variables are stored for example all the bought resources from the market before being placed in the player storage
